PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CooledBeamTypeCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Cooled beam common attributes. SoundLevel and SoundAttenuation attributes deleted in IFC2x2 Pset Addendum: Use IfcSoundProperties instead.

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1'), Also referred to as "construction type". It should be provided as an alternative to the name of the "object type", if the software does not support object types.

PropertyDef.Name: Status
PropertyDef.Definition: Status of the element, predominately used in renovation or retrofitting projects. The status can be assigned to as "New" - element designed as new addition, "Existing" - element exists and remains, "Demolish" - element existed but is to be demolished, "Temporary" - element will exists only temporary (like a temporary support structure).

PropertyDef.Name: IsFreeHanging
PropertyDef.Definition: Is it free hanging type (not mounted in a false ceiling)?

PropertyDef.Name: PipeConnection
PropertyDef.Definition: The manner in which the pipe connection is made to the cooled beam.

PropertyDef.Name: WaterFlowControlSystemType
PropertyDef.Definition: Factory fitted waterflow control system.

PropertyDef.Name: WaterPressureRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Allowable water circuit working pressure range.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalCoolingCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal cooling capacity.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalSurroundingTemperatureCooling
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal surrounding temperature (refers to nominal cooling capacity).

PropertyDef.Name: NominalSurroundingHumidityCooling
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal surrounding humidity (refers to nominal cooling capacity).

PropertyDef.Name: NominalSupplyWaterTemperatureCooling
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal supply water temperature (refers to nominal cooling capacity).

PropertyDef.Name: NominalReturnWaterTemperatureCooling
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal return water temperature (refers to nominal cooling capacity).

PropertyDef.Name: NominalWaterFlowCooling
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal water flow (refers to nominal cooling capacity).

PropertyDef.Name: NominalHeatingCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal heating capacity.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalSurroundingTemperatureHeating
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal surrounding temperature (refers to nominal heating capacity).

PropertyDef.Name: NominalSupplyWaterTemperatureHeating
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal supply water temperature (refers to nominal heating capacity).

PropertyDef.Name: NominalReturnWaterTemperatureHeating
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal return water temperature (refers to nominal heating capacity).

PropertyDef.Name: NominalWaterFlowHeating
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal water flow (refers to nominal heating capacity).

PropertyDef.Name: IntegratedLightingType
PropertyDef.Definition: Integrated lighting in cooled beam.

PropertyDef.Name: FinishColor
PropertyDef.Definition: The finish color for the air terminal.

PropertyDef.Name: CoilLength
PropertyDef.Definition: Length of coil.

PropertyDef.Name: CoilWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: Width of coil.
